title: CryptoATM
author: CryptoATM
content: Is there any survey website or application that pays users in any form of crypto? I have been looking for one or two but no luck, most survey websites are paying through PayPal Venmo and other but not crypto.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: I do not think that this topic is appropriate for beginners; it will be off-topic.Such platforms certainly exist, and you should certainly insert the query into the search. I have also been interested in such surveys for a very long time, so your question attracted me.The first thing I came across, so you can see it at the link. https://www.dollarbreak.com/bitcoin-survey-sites/Once upon a time, there was a way to get a few bucks while spending a minimum of time.
